Title: Establishes the office of the independent intellectual and developmental disability ombudsman program
Summary: Establishes the office of the independent intellectual and developmental disability ombudsman program for the purpose of assisting individuals with intellectual or developmental disabilities to ensure that they receive coverage from managed care organizations that is appropriate in meeting their individual service needs; uses a request for proposal process to determine who shall be responsible for such program.
LawCode: Add ยง33.29, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the establishment of the independent intellectual and developmental disability ombudsman program
